extendedInfo.description: Australia Hotel 80% Discount is one of the largest hotel comparison site with more than 2300++ hotels booking in Australia.You get the best interactive Australia hotel booking experience with the Australia Hotels Booking Booking free Android app â¢ Cheap hotel rooms or 5 star luxury suites,making it easy to find the best accommodation including hotels, apartments and B&Bs.â¢ Use our hotel guest reviews and opinions from genuine customers to find the perfect hotel for you â we even include TripAdvisor reviews!â¢ Search for a place to stay close to your location as well as on our interactive maps.â¢ Choose your favorite brands including; Hilton, Marriott, Best Western, Sheraton, Holiday Inn and many more.Reserve your hotel in Australia with ease and at the best rate from your phone. Book your room now!Features include:â¢ Simple search by location, dates and guestsâ¢ âAround Meâ search to find what is available around you at that exact momentâ¢ Search results can be viewed two ways - on a map or in a list formatâ¢ Interactive map with zoom in, zoom out, and swipe to reveal more hotels â¢ View all hotel details, guest ratings, images and features the hotel offersâ¢ Comparison table for all hotels and the best rates available for all our partner booking sitesâ¢ Refine your search by price, star ratings, areas, hotel features and moreâ¢ Book with our partner websites by simply clicking âbookâ on your hotel of choiceâ¢ Big image gallery â¢ Apps in 39 languagesâ¢ The only app that allow you to search all the hotel deals in Malaysia and All other Countries.â¢ One search and our app will search all the listed hotels and give you the best prices in one screen for all the deals.  You will see a list of price comparison of the website listed here:www.Hotels.com, www.Agoda.com, www.Expedia.com, www.booking.comlastminute.compriceline.comhotels4u.comhostelbookers.comlaterooms.comeasytobook.comvenere.comHotelclub.comholidayinn.comMarriottSkooshCrowne Plaza
